Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.MarketBoard

Interface Marble

All Known Implementing Classes:
MarbleBlue, MarbleGray, MarblePurple, MarbleRed, MarbleWhite, MarbleYellow
public interface Marble
This interface represents the marbles and it provides useful methods for managing them.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addResource​(Board board, int shelf)
    This method allow to add a resource.
    boolean checkMarble​(Marble marble, Board board)
    This method checks if the the marble passed as parameter is among those allowed
    void discard​(Board board)
    This method allow to discard a resource.
    java.lang.String getImage()  
    Resource getResourceAssociated()  
    boolean isWhite()  
    CLIColors toColor()  
    java.util.LinkedList<Marble> whiteTransformations​(Board board)
    This method returns a LinkedList of Marble which contains all the marbles that can be used instead of the white one.

  • Method Details

    • addResource

      void addResource​(Board board, int shelf)
      This method allow to add a resource.
      Parameters:
      board - is the board of the player
      shelf - is the shelf in which we want to insert the marble

    • discard

      void discard​(Board board)
      This method allow to discard a resource.
      Parameters:
      board - the board of the player

    • checkMarble

      boolean checkMarble​(Marble marble, Board board)
      This method checks if the the marble passed as parameter is among those allowed
      Parameters:
      marble - marble
      board - the board of the player
      Returns:
      true if the the marble passed as parameter is among those allowed, false otherwise

    • whiteTransformations

      java.util.LinkedList<Marble> whiteTransformations​(Board board)
      This method returns a LinkedList of Marble which contains all the marbles that can be used instead of the white one. If there are not marbles that can be used instead of the white one the LinkedList is empty.
      Parameters:
      board - is the board of the player
      Returns:
      LinkedList of Marble which contains all the marbles that can be used instead of the white one

    • toColor

      CLIColors toColor()
      Returns:
      the string associated with the color of the marble

    • getResourceAssociated

      Resource getResourceAssociated()
      Returns:
      the resource associated with the marble

    • getImage

      java.lang.String getImage()
      Returns:
      the image associated with the marble

    • isWhite

      boolean isWhite()
      Returns:
      true if the marble is white, false otherwise
